HTTP Routing Table

/activate | /changePassword | /checkEmail | /find?search=sohel | /forgotPassword | /loggedinUser | /login | /resetPassword | /updateAvatar | /verifyEmail
 
/activate
POST /activate/activation_code
 
/changePassword
POST /changePassword/id
 
/checkEmail
POST /checkEmail
 
/find?search=sohel
GET /find?search=sohel
 
/forgotPassword
POST /forgotPassword
 
/loggedinUser
GET /loggedinUser
 
/login
POST /login
 
/resetPassword
POST /resetPassword
 
/updateAvatar
POST /updateAvatar/id
 
/verifyEmail
POST /verifyEmail
